description:
This course covers basic principles of internal auditing. 

It will take about 90 minutes to complete the course including the quizzes

Every Internal Auditor must take this course to qualify as an auditor.

There are 5 lessons in this course. Lesson 1, Introduction gives a high level overview about auditing and the basic definitions used in this discipline.

Lesson 2, deals with principles of auditing and describes the basic principles such as Ethics, Integrity, Independence, Confidentiality, Fair Presentation and Evidence Based Approach.

Lesson 3, provides details about how to manage an audit program in an organization.

Lesson 4, provides the guidelines on how to perform an audit as a best practice

And lastly Lesson 5 helps in understanding the basic components of an audit report.

There are quizzes embedded in each lesson.
title: Internal Audit Course
